metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5859 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Incorrect security UI in Picture In Picture in Google Chrome prior to119.0.6045.105 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted local HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
